snippet: Jeff Van Gundy, an ESPN analyst and a former Knicks coach, had brief contact with the Nets, a person with knowledge of the situation said Friday.
abstract: NBA Roundup; Brooklyn Nets have reportedly contacted Jeff Van Gundy, ESPN analyst and former New York Knicks coach, as part of their search for new coach; other basketball news noted.
lead_paragraph: Jeff Van Gundy, an ESPN analyst and a former Knicks coach, had brief contact with the Nets, a person with knowledge of the situation said Friday.

headline.seo: Nets Are Said to Contact Jeff Van Gundy for Coaching Vacancy
headline.main: Seeking Coach, Nets Are Said to Contact Jeff Van Gundy
headline.print_headline: Nets Are Said to Have Interest in Jeff Van Gundy
